name: Armored Car Racing: Race untill death
name_original: Armored Car Racing: Race untill death
description:
Ge behind wheels on buggy or any vehicle your like and drive mad on roads. Dont let other drivers get pas you, its race of survival, race that is must to win on these scary, desert roads. this battle is the only hope to get out of this dangerous desert.
Beware , all cars are armoured, you can fire, they will fire back on you, stay ahead of other, shoot them first to get the upper hand.

- buggy and other armored vehicles
- mad racing challenges
- shoots outs on the roads
- race to survice


this game supports ads
